Strata

Strata are used as full-width backgrounds on the site. Like content is grouped within the same strata. Only use strata for full-width/full-screen backgrounds. If you need to give a div a background, please check out colors.

Stratum with gray background
Stratum with black background
Stratum with white background
Stratum with gradient background
Stratum with image background
Stratum with parallax background

Buttons

Button colors

These are the only button colors in use on the GoPro site.

%button
Normal
%a.btn
%button.btn(disabled)
%button.btn.btn--pri
%button.btn.btn--yes
%button.btn.btn--no
%button.btn.btn--drk
%button.btn.btn--link

Button sizes

These are the button sizes currently used on the GoPro site.

%btn.btn--large
Regular
%a.btn.btn--regular
%button.btn.btn--small
%button.btn.btn--block
%button.btn.btn--mini

Buttons with arrows

Use buttons with arrows for any button that links off to another page. The link button does not have a btn-arrow state.

In order to make this button work in HAML, you must use a '>' sign at then end of the '%i' statement to override the whitespace.

Normal 
    %div.btn.btn--arw
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>
Disabled 
    %div.btn.btn--arw(disabled)
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>
Primary 
    %div.btn.btn--pri
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>
Success 
    %div.btn.btn--yes.btn--arw
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>
Danger 
    %div.btn.btn--no.btn--arw
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>
Dark 
    %div.btn.btn--drk.btn--arw
      %i.gopro-chevron-right>

Button-style Dropdowns

All dropdowns on the site should have the following visual treatment. This does not apply to "select" elements used in forms.

Normal >>
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link 
    %div.drp
      %a.drp__btn
      %a.drp__icon
      %ul.drp__menu
        %li
          %a.drp__link
        %li
          %a.drp__link
        %li
          %a.drp__link
        %li__item--sep
          %a.drp__link
Primary >>
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link 
    %div.drp.drp--pri
    …
Normal >>
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link 
    %div.drp.drp--yes
    …
Dark >>
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link 
    %div.drp.drp--drk
    …

The coolest of cool.

Typographic Units

Figure Captions

%figcaption …

<small> Tags

This is regular text, it's regular sized. This is small text, it's quite small; 80% of its parent, to be exact.

%small …
This is fine print. It's very tiny, and fixed size. 
%small.fz-fine-print …
// Can be applied to any element,
// but <small> is still generally the ideal.

Specially designed for GoPro.

Note: These can be applied to ANY text element, so have fun with them! ;P

Tooltips & Popovers

Tooltips

The doge tooltip--top in his natural habitat.

The doge tooltip--right in his natural habitat.

The doge tooltip--bottom in his natural habitat.

The doge tooltip--left in his natural habitat.

The doge Doge is a slang term for “dog” that is primarily associated with pictures of Shiba Inus (nicknamed “Shibe”) and internal monologue captions on Tumblr. in his natural habitat. 

%p
  %span.tooltip__trigger.tooltip__trigger--[clickable|hoverable]
    ...
    %span.tooltip.tooltip--[direction]
      ...

Icons

Animations

Flash Messages

Error

You did that wrong! Fail!
.flash--error
  content
  = link_to "Link", "link", class: "flash__link--error"

Success

Good job! You get a cookie! 
.flash--success
  content
  = link_to "Link", "link", class: "flash__link--success"

Notice

FYI: You might want to pay attention to this 
.flash--notice
  content
  = link_to "Link", "link", class: "flash__link--notice"

Warning

Warning! Danger, Will Robinson! 
.flash--warning
  content
  = link_to "Link", "link", class: "flash__link--warning"

Tables

Windows Mac
hardware
Operating System Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Mac OS 10.6 or greater
CPU Minimum: Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz Recommended: Core i7 Intel Mac Only
Graphics Card Graphics card that supports OpenGL 1.2 or higher Graphocs card that supports OpenGL 1.2 or higher
RAM 4GB or greater 4GB or greater
Hard Drive Minimum: 5400 RPM intel drive Recommeneded: 7200 RPM drive if external, USB 3.0 or eSATA Minimum: 5400 RPM intel drive Recommeneded: 7200 RPM drive if external, USB 3.0 or eSATA
Quick Time Version 7.6 or greater Version 7.6 or greater

*These are footnotes for this table.

Accordions

Accordion with Content

Section Header 1
This is the subcontent! Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Donec sed odio dui. Integer posuere erat a ante venenatis dapibus posuere velit aliquet. Donec sed odio dui.
Section Header 2
This is the subcontent! Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Donec sed odio dui. Integer posuere erat a ante venenatis dapibus posuere velit aliquet. Donec sed odio dui.

Media-Related Classes

Responsive Video Wrappers

For making Videos, especially YouTube embeds, responsive. (Resize the page for MAGIC!)

  %div.vid-wrap
    [youtube embed here]
